participant_1.name: James
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, James is always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow.
participant_1.background: I plan to go to business school next year. I graduated from Yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. My parents are very wealthy bankers. I grew up in Manhattan.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Resilient and hopeful, Sarah thrives in challenging situations and takes pride in her unique experiences.
participant_2.background: I was raised in a single parent household. I only eat kosher. I am a stunt double as my second job. I never broke a bone in my body ever in my life.

content.text:
Buongiorno! Such a nice day! How are you?.
Short bio: grew up in manhattan
Hi there . I'm find and you?
i'm a little sad my best friend just moved. how is it going today ?
i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. but i guess it may happen today
i've three , and am named for my grandmother .. Also, try to guess: my parents are ...
i was raised in a single parent household. Do you have any parents living with you?
being poor i learned that yoga helps ease the mind , so i practice and hike .
i'm too slim for yoga so i only eat kosher. What is your favorite food?
pizza it is the bomb i like to snack on pizza .
have you ever seen anyone who don't like pizza?
nope , but i have seen the fall. how has your day been ?
I just got a new job. i am a stunt double as my second job.do you have a job?
i'm the baby in the family , you know the youngest ! no i don't
